name: Army Attack
description:
The army wants to have all the world, you need to stop them by placing turrets and defend your base. Be carrefuly enemys are very smart and have tanks, cars and planes.

Tips:

- You can destroy the planes just with rocket launcher

- You can restart game when you want by pressing pause menu

- Move camera with click + slide

- If you get crash or find bugs let us know

Credits:

- Pascariu Liviu-Constantin - Main developer
